reviews.review: Tem uma história boa, jogabilidade boa, e uma interatividade com o cenário incrivel. Sinceramente, é um jogo que se destaca muito dos jogos de ação comuns. Não adianta ter mira boa, ser inteligente, fazer bom uso de munição e interação com os objetos vai fazer você zerar esse jogo rapidinho.
Possibly the best single player FPS ever made, great story, great gameplay, and nice graphix.

O jogo me chamou atenção principalmente pela adrenalina. Eu não imaginava que o jogo fosse ser tão "DIEHARD 3.0" hahaha. A história é legal, porém bem enrolada. A engine eu achei um pouco ultrapassada, e, apesar do jogo ser de fato bom, não acredito que seu score deva ser tão alto.

今更このゲームをやろうって人はいなさそうだけど、それでも一応、今はじめたとしても十分なクオリティを持ったこのゲームはオススメである。
エンジンは物理法則の再現に重点を置いたというだけあって、シーソーの片方に物を積んで固定して反対側からジャンプさせたり、高圧電流の流れている水面に樽をいくつも浮かべて反対へ渡らせたり、重力を操作する銃が出てきたりと凝ったギミックが出てくる。
またライティングも綺麗であり、VALVEを代表する作品だけある。

ちなみにこのゲームが発売された時点では、Steamはただのオンライン認証アプリであった。Steamも進化したもんだ。

Иногда не понятно куда надо идти

Absolutely fantastic. People would be suprised when i say that this game was made in 2003. The graphics are great, even to todays standards. The story is fantastic, the controls is very smooth and nice, and its quite hard, even on easy. But I like hard games that give fair challange, and not unfair bouncing into holes wwhen hit by enemys. (like some should-be unnamed 1980s dracula games.) And if your computer is up to speed? There is loads of options to change the graphics to give yourself a smooth game.
In the end, I rate this 10/10.

How can you top up Half-Life? So many versatile challenges filled with both action and exploration? Half-Life 2 attempts to do it hollywood style: impressive visuals and a clever narrative playing around with your expectations. Like many sci-fi sequels, the moody horror survival shifts progressively towards pure action. You will be joining the resistance and getting help from the creatures that were your worst enemy on the previous installment (like in Terminator 2) to destroy the combine soldiers and robots (occasionnaly with the use of vehicules like a sand boggie and an airboat). Weirdly enough there aren't any new alien characters here and the ending is rather abrupt. But worry not, the rollercoaster continues in episodes 1 & 2 picking the action right where you left it off.

ademas el 2 no se queda atras ,no señor. Con mas sentido tene la historia y con un motor grafico que es exelente para los que tienen una computadora de pocos recursos aunque hay cosas que no me gustaron pero son unos detalles menores.

Si la primera parte ya era muy buena, esta alcanza el nivel de obra maestra. Con una jugabilidad mejorada (más si cabe), muy buen apartado gráfico, una banda sonora absorvente, y de nuevo, una historia que hará que te preguntes muchas cosas... Para mi una vez más, el punto fuerte del juego, la historia.

Esta segunda parte es largo más larga que su predecesora, un poco corta en mi opinión (alguna pega habría que ponerle), y si quieres completarlo al 100% con logros, tendrás que dedicar muchas horas, pero merecerá la pena.

Una pena que el tercer y definitivo este abandonado, yo personalmente me quedo con ganas de más... Siempre quedarán las expansiones, y por supuesto, volver a jugarlo.

Português: Um dos primeiros jogos que fizeram sucesso da valve® e até hoje não deixa de fazer o mesmo, continuo a recomendar a meus amigos pois se você tiver Halflife 2® você pode ter vários MOD's que exigem o jogo, além de poder jogar Halflife 2® online com o MOD synergy e se tiver Episodio   1 e 2 também poderá jogar eles online, a campanha é muito grande e diversificada, só achei que tem poucas armas mas a diversão é garantida.

English: One of the first games that were successful in the Valve ® and even today do not stop doing it, I still recommend it to my friends because if you have Halflife 2 ® you can have multiple MODs requiring the game, and can play Halflife 2 ® online with the Synergy MOD and have Episode 1 and 2 can also play them online, the campaign is very large and diverse, just thought have few weapons but fun is guaranteed.

This is the game that sparked a host of mods, and presented the Source Engine to the gaming world.  There's a reason VALVe is known for this game.  It is truly amazing!  Many features of the Portal series, including sounds and objects, got their start here and helped define Portal.  The graphics are amazing for 2004, and nowadays will look sweet without melting your computer.  As for the story, it blew me away.  It starts some time after Half-Life, and uses the same style of storytelling they invented there and utilized through the rest of the Half-Life series and in both Portal games.  It is immersive, has lots of action in all the right places, includes puzzles made from the environment that really make you think creatively, and doesn't use cutscenes, but keeps you in the game at all times.  After playing Half-Life, I wanted Half-Life 2 right then!  The same goes for when I beat HL2, my first thought was: "When I can I get the next game!?"  The story is that good.  On top of all that, Half-Life 2 features some great instrumental music, which was designed like a movie score: The music starts where the action does and fits the mood perfectly.  I would say the music got me more excited and "in the zone" than seeing the hordes of CPs, Walkers, or even Headcrab Zombies.  That said, there is some blood, more gore than I expected (you can kill zombies by decapitation and slicing in half using saw blades and the gravity gun, and you discover burned and/or mutilated bodies from past battles and alien attacks) and some strong language.  Overall, a great game for a great price.

It's a bastion of level design, interactive storytelling and first-person shooting; a hallmark in Video Game history. The single most significant and resonant game when it comes to action interwined with a punctual narrative without either feeling out of place. That may seem overly specific, but Half-Life 2 creates a world with more impact than Orwell's '1984', with the most innovative level design that games have witnessed. Possibly the best game on Steam.

I. Love. This. Game. It is a really good game and have an immersive Story that you can understand. However, the game does kind of feel like it is guiding you away from the objective with its most Combat Storyline, and with puzzles. The feature of having no Quest Marker gives the game its own unique feeling, where you have to use your brain to its full capacity to get to the end of the game. It's not just an action game, its about the desperate struggle of the Human Race. The only downside to Half Life games is that your almost alone all throughout the game, but there are parts where you venture with allies like Rebels, Aliens, and even a Priest. BUt the times where you do get to Allied places, you spend about a minute or two there before your stuck to find a way out. Personally, I found that Half Life 2 was a lot less fun than Half Life 2 Episodes 1 & 2. If you want to buy the game for the storyline, I suggest buying the Half Life pack. It has all the Half Lifes to date ( Apart from Steam Greenlight ones ) including mini games like Team Fortress Classic ( Which I will never play ) and Half Life 2 ( Which is boring! ) If you dont want to play the game for the action, I suggest just buying the Orange Box, but I highly recommend watching some timeline videos or go onto the internet and research about the Half Life Storyline, so you can get your head around what is happening half of the time ( See what I did there? ;) )

All in all, I think this game deserved every Award it recieved. It's too bad GabeN can't count to 3.

Well... The name implies everything: Your life is not complete with the Half-Life you don't have. This games is great, it's a good shooter with lots of puzzles and a great story, that it's no surprise it's the game with the highest Metascore evaluation on Steam. If i recommend?
